item.title: Running C# Scripts with dotnet-script
item.description: Goal Run C# scripts (.csx files) with NuGet package support using dotnet-script. Install dotnet-script dotnet tool install -g dotnet-script Create a .csx script file // script.csx ##r "nuget:Newtonsoft.Json, 13.0.1" using Newtonsoft.Json; using Newtonsoft.Json.Linq; var args = Environment.GetCommandLineArgs(); if(args.Any(a => a == "--dry-run")) { return; } Console.WriteLine("Using Newtonsoft.Json to parse JSON."); var json = JObject.Parse(@"{ 'name': 'John', 'age': 30 }"); Console.WriteLine(json["name"]); NuGet packages are referenced using #r "nuget:PackageName, Version" at the top of the file.
